paragraphWithMe: Programmer with solid technical training and extensive experience in web development. Expert in languages such as JavaScript, PHP and Ruby, as well as frameworks such as React, React Native, Angular and Ruby On Rails, he has demonstrated skill in planning, designing and building user interface systems. His career includes roles in companies such as Capmotion Technologies, Play Us Media and Magnetr√≥n S.A.S, where he stood out for his ability to implement innovative solutions and maintain quality standards.
